platform.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*H********************************************************************************/
2 /*!
3  \File platform.h
4 
5  \Description
6  A platform wide header that performs environment identification and replaces
7  some standard lib functions with "safe" alternatives (such an snprintf that
8  always terminates the buffer).
9 
10  \Copyright
11  Copyright (c) 2005 Electronic Arts Inc.
12 
13  \Version 01/25/2005 (gschaefer) First Version
14 */
15 /********************************************************************************H*/
16 
17 #ifndef _platform_h
18 #define _platform_h
19 
20 /*!
21 \Moduledef Platform Platform
22 \Modulemember DirtySock
23 */
24 //@{
25

30 /*** Defines **********************************************************************/
31 
32 // identify platform if not yet known
33 #if defined(DIRTYCODE_PC) || defined(DIRTYCODE_LINUX)
34 // do nothing
35 #elif defined (EA_PLATFORM_CAPILANO)
36  #define DIRTYCODE_XBOXONE 1
37 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_MICROSOFT)
38  #if defined(EA_WINAPI_FAMILY) && ((EA_WINAPI_FAMILY == EA_WINAPI_FAMILY_APP) || (EA_WINAPI_FAMILY == EA_WINAPI_FAMILY_PHONE_APP))
39  #define DIRTYCODE_WINRT 1
40  #endif
41  #if defined(EA_WINAPI_FAMILY) && (EA_WINAPI_FAMILY == EA_WINAPI_FAMILY_APP)
42  #define DIRTYCODE_WINRT_ONLY 1
43  #elif defined(EA_WINAPI_FAMILY) && (EA_WINAPI_FAMILY == EA_WINAPI_FAMILY_PHONE_APP)
44  #define DIRTYCODE_WINPRT_ONLY 1
45  #else
46  #define DIRTYCODE_PC 1
47  #endif
48 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_PS4)
49  #define DIRTYCODE_PS4 1
50 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_IPHONE) || defined(EA_PLATFORM_IPHONE_SIMULATOR)
51  #define DIRTYCODE_APPLEIOS 1
52 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_OSX)
53  #define DIRTYCODE_APPLEOSX 1
54 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_ANDROID)
55  #define DIRTYCODE_ANDROID 1
56 #elif defined(EA_PLATFORM_LINUX)
57  #define DIRTYCODE_LINUX 1
58 #endif
59 
60 // define platform name
61 #if defined(DIRTYCODE_ANDROID)
62 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "Android"
63 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "android"
64 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_APPLEIOS)
65 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "AppleIOS"
66 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "ios"
67 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_APPLEOSX)
68 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "AppleOSX"
69 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "osx"
70 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_XBOXONE)
71 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "XboxOne"
72 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "xone"
73 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_PS4)
74 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "PlayStation4"
75 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "ps4"
76 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_LINUX)
77 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "Linux"
78 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "linux"
79 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_PC)
80 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "Windows"
81 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "pc"
82 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_WINRT_ONLY)
83 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "Windows8"
84 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "winrt"
85 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_WINPRT_ONLY)
86 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME "WindowsPhone8"
87 #define DIRTYCODE_PLATNAME_SHORT "winprt"
88 #else
89 #error The platform was not predefined and could not be auto-determined!
90 #endif

104 // define 32-bit or 64-bit pointers

106  #define DIRTYCODE_64BITPTR (1)
107 #else
108  #define DIRTYCODE_64BITPTR (0)
109 #endif

117 
118 // force our definition of TRUE/FALSE
119 #ifdef TRUE
120 #undef TRUE
121 #undef FALSE
122 #endif
123 
124 #define FALSE (0)
125 #define TRUE (1)
126 
127 // map common debug code definitions to our debug code definition
128 #ifndef DIRTYCODE_DEBUG
129  #if defined(EA_DEBUG)
130  #define DIRTYCODE_DEBUG (1)
131  #else
132  #define DIRTYCODE_DEBUG (0)
133  #endif
134 #endif

136 /*** Macros ***********************************************************************/
137 
138 //! min of _x and _y
139 #define DS_MIN(_x, _y) (((_x) < (_y)) ? (_x) : (_y))
140 
141 //! max of _x and _y
142 #define DS_MAX(_x, _y) (((_x) > (_y)) ? (_x) : (_y))
143 
144 //! abs of _x
145 #define DS_ABS(_x) (((_x) < 0) ? -(_x) : (_x))
146 
147 //! clamp _x between _min and _max; if _low < _high result is undefined
148 #define DS_CLAMP(_x, _min, _max) (((_x) > (_max)) ? (_max) : (((_x) < (_min)) ? (_min) : (_x)))
149 
150 /*** Type Definitions *************************************************************/
151 
152 //! time-to-string conversion type
153 typedef enum TimeToStringConversionTypeE
154 {
155  TIMETOSTRING_CONVERSION_ISO_8601, //!< ISO 8601 standard: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ where Z means 0 UTC offset, and no Z means local time zone
156  TIMETOSTRING_CONVERSION_RFC_0822, //!< RFC 0822 format, updated by RFC1123: day, dd mon yyyy hh:mm:ss zzz
157  TIMETOSTRING_CONVERSION_ASN1_UTCTIME, //!< ASN.1 UTCTime format
158  TIMETOSTRING_CONVERSION_ASN1_GENTIME, //!< ASN.1 GeneralizedTime format
159  TIMETOSTRING_CONVERSION_UNKNOWN //!< unknown source format type; try to auto-determine if possible
160 } TimeToStringConversionTypeE;

192 DIRTYCODE_API char *ds_stristr(const char *pHaystack, const char *pNeedle);
193 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(_WIN64)
194  #define ds_strtoll(_buf, _outp, _radix) _strtoi64(_buf, _outp, _radix)
195  #define ds_strtoull(_buf, _outp, _radix) _strtoui64(_buf, _outp, _radix)
196 #else
197  #define ds_strtoll(_buf, _outp, _radix) strtoll(_buf, _outp, _radix)
198  #define ds_strtoull(_buf, _outp, _radix) strtoull(_buf, _outp, _radix)
199 #endif

205 DIRTYCODE_API int32_t ds_stricmpwc(const char *pString1, const char *pStrWild);
